title: Bible Basics: A Baby Believer Counting Primer
description: Bible Basics: A Baby Believer Counting Primer is the first of a groundbreaking series of board books that go beyond Bible stories and introduce young children to core tenets of the Christian faith. As a counting book for babies and toddlers, Bible Basics creates a fun learning experience by reformatting theological and Biblical content into a concept that small children can understand and retain. For older children, Bible Basics includes quotations from the Bible, hymns, and early church writings to help reinforce the content.
author: Danielle Hitchen
